sentences.en: He could not bring himself to like the boastful, vain Arabella.
sentences.cn: 他无法让自己喜欢爱夸耀的 、 虚荣的阿拉贝拉.

sentences.en: He is still vain enough to dye his hair red.
sentences.cn: 他还是很虚荣，把头发染成了红褐色。

sentences.en: He was self-important, vain and ignorant.
sentences.cn: 他傲慢自负，虚荣无知。

sentences.en: Her modesty is all put on; at heart she is very vain.
sentences.cn: 她的谦逊全是假装的, 内心里她是很虚荣的.

sentences.en: I am not a vain creature.
sentences.cn: 我不是个爱慕虚荣的人。

sentences.en: In making that plea he will breathe in vain.
sentences.cn: 他做那种恳求是白费口舌的.

sentences.en: It became obvious that all her complaints were in vain.
sentences.cn: 很明显她所有的抱怨都是白费口舌。

sentences.en: It was in vain that we tried to find his mother.
sentences.cn: 我们百般设法找他的母亲,但毫无结果.

sentences.en: Men can be just as vain as women.
sentences.cn: 男人有时会和女人一样虚荣。

sentences.en: Our labor was in vain.
sentences.cn: 我们的劳动是白费力气

sentences.en: Parents campaigned in vain for her reinstatement.
sentences.cn: 父母们呼吁给她复职，但结果却只是徒劳。

sentences.en: Police searched in vain for the missing gunman.
sentences.cn: 警方搜寻失踪的持枪歹徒，但毫无结果。

sentences.en: She closed her eyes tightly in a vain attempt to hold back the tears.
sentences.cn: 她紧闭双眼，却无法忍住眼泪。

sentences.en: She is one of those vain people who never take others'advice.
sentences.cn: 她属于那种自负得从不听别人劝告的人.

sentences.en: The drafting committee worked through the night in a vain attempt to finish on schedule.
sentences.cn: 起草委员会徒劳地通宵工作想按期完成工作。

sentences.en: The young mother died in a vain attempt to save her drowning son.
sentences.cn: 那位年轻的母亲没能救起溺水的儿子，自己也淹死了。

sentences.en: They attempted in vain to modernise these antiquated industries.
sentences.cn: 他们企图使这些陈旧的工业现代化,结果劳而无功.

sentences.en: They endeavored to make her happy, but in vain.
sentences.cn: 他们想方设法地使她高兴, 但那是徒劳的.

sentences.en: took the name of the Lord in vain.
sentences.cn: 妄称上帝之名

sentences.en: We tried in vain to make him change his mind.
sentences.cn: 我们试图使他改变主意,结果是白费心机.

sentences.en: Who's been taking my name in vain? I don't hold such an opinion.
sentences.cn: 谁在滥用我的名义? 我不赞成这个建议.

words.tran_cn: 虚荣心强的；非常自负的

trans.tran_cn: 徒劳的，不成功的，无望的，自负的，虚荣的
trans.tran_en: someone who is vain is too proud of their good looks, abilities, or position – used to show disapproval
